task.title: Adding and removing markup language templates - overview
task.shortdesc: Content assist provides templates, or chunks of predefined code, that you can insert into a file. You can use the default templates as provided, customize the default templates, or create your own templates.

taskbody.context:
Templates are available for the following markup languages:
HTML or XHTML
JSP

link.linktext: Structured text editors for markup languages
Editing text coded in markup languages - overview
